name: next
description: 1 ) npm init -y (this will create package.json) 2 ) yarn add -D webpack (this will add node_modules)   2.1) create file webpack.config.js   2.2) create two folder dist and src.   2.3) under dist creat index.html and under src create index.js   2.4) add <script src="bundle.js"> in index.html   2.5) add `       const path = require('path');
